hero.title: About Us
hero.description: We aim for a universal AI era where everyone can easily and practically use AI.

vision.title: Vision
vision.titleEn: AI for Education, Education for AI
vision.titleKo: AI for Education, Education for AI
vision.description: Education is the most powerful tool for preparing for the AI era, and AI is the most effective means of innovating education. The AI Lab creates this virtuous cycle, realizing a society where AI literacy is universal.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Artificial intelligence is not limited to specific fields or a few experts, but enables everyone to freely utilize AI in their lives and work.

cta.title: Building the AI Era Together
cta.description: Prepare for the future of AI with The AI Lab
